title: Producer Rebecca Totally Screwed Up On The Job!
description:
She had one job...and she screwed up! The tortilla challenge has gone majorly viral on social media but The Bert Show had to reschedule our attempt! Why? Because social media producer didn't really understand what a tortilla was...
